ComicInfo.Title: Want You To Want Me: Part 1: The Complete Idiot's Guide to Metaphors
ComicInfo.Summary: “WANT YOU TO WANT ME,” PART 1 Now that he knows that a pirate’s life isn’t for him, Deadpool's now starting to seriously question this whole “mercenary” thing. Maybe there’s something else he could do with his life. He doesn’t know what that could be, but then he turns on the television, and he knows exactly where he needs to be, and who needs him most. Hello, San Francisco!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:01:34. [CVDB169211]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Jody LeHeup, Joe Quesada
ComicInfo.Characters: Blind Al, Cyclops, Deadpool, Death, Emma Frost, Hulk, Luke Cage, Namor, Spider-Man, Thanos, Weasel, Wolverine
